analysis.description:
JUST.fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol#203-208) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol#204-205)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_name' of JUST.UNJUST (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol#151) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_symbol' of JUST.UNJUST (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol#151-152) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_stdBalance' of JUST.UNJUST (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol#152-153) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_address' of JUST.rescueTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x7cee63b86801b16eef574badd779c589caaa476d.sol) is not in mixedCase
